name: A Cube's Adventure (Happy Editor)
description:
A Cube's Adventure

Due to this game's awesome physics and  world you will find It really fun to play ! During your journey on this game you won't be alone since the other cube guys will guide you during your beautiful adventure ! 

HOW TO PLAY ?

Pick Up Items - "E" , Jump - "SPACE" , Move - "ARROWS" , Attack - "ARROWS" & "SPACE" , Open Map - "M" .

Your Opinion on this game would be much appreciated !
